text: Brandon Pirri (born April 10, 1991, in Toronto, Ontario) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He currently plays the Vegas Golden Knights of the National Hockey League (NHL). Before he played in the NHL, Pirri played in the Ontario Junior Hockey League for the Streetsville Derbys and the Georgetown Raiders. He also played at the Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in the ECAC Hockey conference. He was drafted by the Blackhawks with the 59th overall pick in the 2009 NHL Entry Draft. He spends most of his time with the Blackhawks AHL farm team, the Rockford IceHogs. On March 2, 2014, the Blackhawks traded Pirri to the Florida Panthers for a 2014 3rd round pick and a 2016 5th round pick. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Anaheim Ducks players Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Chicago Wolves players Category:Florida Panthers players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players
title: Brandon Pirri
